title: Two routes out of Helvetian territory

content.question:
Two routes out of Helvetian territory

Erant omninoomnino: altogether itinera duo, quibus itineribus domo exire possent: unum per Sequanos, angustumangustus, -a, -um: narrow et difficile, inter montem IuramIura, -ae, m.: Jura mountains et flumen Rhodanum,Rhodanus, -i, m.: Rhône river vix qua singuli carricarrus, -i, m.: wagon ducerentur, mons autem altissimus impendebat,impendeo,-ere: hang over, overhang ut facile perpauci prohibere possent; alterum per provinciam nostram.

Bellum Gallicum 1. 6

Translate the passage above as literally as possible.
